trans-unit.source: Provides access and information for manipulating I/O streams within a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso e informações para a manipulação de fluxos de E/S em um <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption" /> setting for the stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a configuração <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption" /> do fluxo.

trans-unit.source: The compression option setting for the package stream.
trans-unit.target: A configuração da opção de compactação para o fluxo do pacote.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Enumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> has been called on the stream, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.CompressionOption%2A> property returns CompressionOption.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption.NotCompressed>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Enumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> foi chamado no fluxo, o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.CompressionOption%2A> propriedade retorna CompressionOption.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption.NotCompressed>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptionOption" /> setting for the stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a configuração <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptionOption" /> do fluxo.

trans-unit.source: The encryption option setting for the package stream.
trans-unit.target: A configuração da opção de criptografia para o fluxo do pacote.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Enumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> has been called on the stream, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.EncryptionOption%2A> property returns EncryptionOption.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptionOption.None>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Enumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> foi chamado no fluxo, o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.EncryptionOption%2A> propriedade retorna EncryptionOption.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptionOption.None>.

trans-unit.source: Opens and returns the I/O stream for the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> root.
trans-unit.target: Abre e retorna o fluxo de E/S para o <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> raiz.

trans-unit.source: Returns a stream opened in a default <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> and <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um fluxo aberto em um <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> e <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> padrão.

trans-unit.source: The I/O stream opened in a default <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> root <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> and <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" />..
trans-unit.target: O fluxo de E/S aberto em um <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> raiz <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> padrão e <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" />.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.GetStream%2A> method (without parameters), opens the stream in file mode <xref:System.IO.FileMode.OpenOrCreate> with the default storage root <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.GetStream%2A> método (sem parâmetros), abre o fluxo no modo de arquivo <xref:System.IO.FileMode.OpenOrCreate> com a raiz de armazenamento padrão <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>.

trans-unit.source: The file mode in which to open the stream.
trans-unit.target: O modo de arquivo no qual abrir o fluxo.

trans-unit.source: Returns an I/O stream opened in a specified <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um fluxo de E/S aberto em um <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The stream opened in the specified file <paramref name="mode" />.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo aberto no arquivo <paramref name="mode" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.GetStream%2A> method opens the stream with the default storage root <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.GetStream%2A> método abre o fluxo com a raiz de armazenamento padrão <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>.

trans-unit.source: The file mode in which to open the stream.
trans-unit.target: O modo de arquivo no qual abrir o fluxo.

trans-unit.source: The file access mode in which to read or write to the stream.
trans-unit.target: O modo de acesso de arquivo no qual o fluxo será lido ou gravado.

trans-unit.source: Returns an I/O stream opened in a specified <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> and with a given <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um fluxo de E/S aberto em um <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> especificado e com um <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> determinado.

trans-unit.source: The I/O stream opened in the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> and with a given <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo de E/S aberto no <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> especificado e com um <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> determinado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do fluxo.

trans-unit.source: The name of this stream.
trans-unit.target: O nome deste fluxo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Enumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> has been called on the stream, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.Name%2A> property returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Enumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> foi chamado no fluxo, o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo.Name%2A> propriedade retorna uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.
